num_1.name: Intoduction to Social Psyhology
num_1.text: We often have firmly held beliefs about why people think and behave the way they do. Sometimes our intuitions are correct, but often they are not.

num_2.name: Digital design

num_3.name: Masters degree
num_3.text: The Master’s Degree in Electrical and Computer Engineering equips you with the depth and breadth of knowledge and relevant skills needed to succeed in today’s engineering world.

num_4.name: MicroBachelors
num_4.text: No matter if you have some or no college experience, MicroBachelors programs are built for adult learners looking to progress their career. Created by top universities.
